```{r}
#convert ensembl id to gene symbol
library(biomaRt)

all_names <- rownames(expr_mat)
is_ens <- grepl("^ENSMUSG", all_names)
to_map <- all_names[is_ens]
mouse_ensembl <- useEnsembl(
  biomart = "genes", 
  dataset = "mmusculus_gene_ensembl"
)
mapping_df <- getBM(
  attributes = c("ensembl_gene_id", "external_gene_name"),
  filters    = "ensembl_gene_id",
  values     = to_map,
  mart       = mouse_ensembl
)
map_vec <- setNames(mapping_df$external_gene_name,
                    mapping_df$ensembl_gene_id)

not_found <- setdiff(to_map, names(map_vec))
if (length(not_found) > 0) {
  map_vec[not_found] <- not_found
}

new_row_names <- all_names
new_row_names[is_ens] <- map_vec[ all_names[is_ens] ]

new_row_names <- make.unique(new_row_names)

rownames(expr_mat) <- new_row_names

```

```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(dplyr)

# 创建Seurat对象
seurat_obj <- CreateSeuratObject(
  counts = expr_mat,
  project = "PerturbationDEG",
  min.cells = 1,
  min.features = 1
)

# 定义gRNA基因
dnmt3a_grnas <- c('Dnmt3a-g1', 'Dnmt3a-g2')
safe_grnas <- c('Safe-g1', 'Safe-g2')

# 检查基因是否存在 - 使用实际存在于矩阵中的基因
available_genes <- rownames(seurat_obj)
dnmt3a_grnas <- dnmt3a_grnas[dnmt3a_grnas %in% available_genes]
safe_grnas <- safe_grnas[safe_grnas %in% available_genes]

# 打印可用的gRNA基因
message("可用的Dnmt3a gRNAs: ", paste(dnmt3a_grnas, collapse = ", "))
message("可用的Safe gRNAs: ", paste(safe_grnas, collapse = ", "))

# 确保至少有一个gRNA可用
if (length(dnmt3a_grnas) == 0) stop("没有可用的Dnmt3a gRNA基因")
if (length(safe_grnas) == 0) stop("没有可用的Safe gRNA基因")

# 提取gRNA表达数据
grna_data <- GetAssayData(seurat_obj, slot = "counts")

# 创建Dnmt3a扰动组（至少一个Dnmt3a gRNA表达）
dnmt3a_expr <- colSums(grna_data[dnmt3a_grnas, , drop = FALSE]) > 0

# 创建Safe扰动组（至少一个Safe gRNA表达）
safe_expr <- colSums(grna_data[safe_grnas, , drop = FALSE]) > 0

# 创建组合分组
seurat_obj$perturbation_group <- "Neither"
seurat_obj$perturbation_group[dnmt3a_expr & !safe_expr] <- "Dnmt3a"
seurat_obj$perturbation_group[!dnmt3a_expr & safe_expr] <- "Safe"
seurat_obj$perturbation_group[dnmt3a_expr & safe_expr] <- "Both"

# 检查细胞数量并打印
cell_counts <- table(seurat_obj$perturbation_group)
print("细胞分组统计:")
print(cell_counts)

# 仅保留Dnmt3a和Safe组进行比较
cells_to_keep <- seurat_obj$perturbation_group %in% c("Dnmt3a", "Safe")
seurat_subset <- subset(seurat_obj, cells = colnames(seurat_obj)[cells_to_keep])

# 设置分组标识符
Idents(seurat_subset) <- "perturbation_group"

# 确保两组都有足够的细胞
if (sum(seurat_subset$perturbation_group == "Dnmt3a") < 3) {
  message("警告: Dnmt3a组细胞少于3个，可能无法进行可靠的DEG分析")
}
if (sum(seurat_subset$perturbation_group == "Safe") < 3) {
  message("警告: Safe组细胞少于3个，可能无法进行可靠的DEG分析")
}

# 执行DEG分析
deg_results <- FindMarkers(
  object = seurat_subset,
  ident.1 = "Dnmt3a",
  ident.2 = "Safe",
  min.pct = 0.05,        # 降低表达比例阈值
  logfc.threshold = 0.05, # 降低logFC阈值
  test.use = "wilcox",   # 使用Wilcoxon检验
  only.pos = FALSE       # 获取上下调基因
)

# 添加基因名和显著性标记
deg_results$gene <- rownames(deg_results)
deg_results$significant <- deg_results$p_val_adj < 0.05

# 过滤显著结果并排序
significant_deg <- deg_results %>%
  filter(significant) %>%
  arrange(desc(avg_log2FC))

# 查看结果
print("显著差异表达基因:")
print(head(significant_deg, 10))

# 可视化 - 确保有显著结果
if (nrow(significant_deg) > 0) {
  # 1. 火山图
  volcano_plot <- ggplot(deg_results, aes(x = avg_log2FC, y = -log10(p_val_adj), 
                         color = significant, label = gene)) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("grey", "red")) +
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed") +
    geom_hline(yintercept = -log10(0.05), linetype = "dashed") +
    ggtitle("Dnmt3a vs Safe Perturbation DEG") +
    theme_minimal()
  
  # 标记前10个显著基因
  top_genes <- head(significant_deg$gene, 10)
  volcano_plot <- volcano_plot + 
    geom_text_repel(
      data = subset(deg_results, gene %in% top_genes),
      aes(label = gene),
      box.padding = 0.5,
      max.overlaps = Inf
    )
  
  print(volcano_plot)
  
  # 2. 热图展示前20个差异基因
  top_genes_heatmap <- head(significant_deg$gene, 20)
  if (length(top_genes_heatmap) > 0) {
    DoHeatmap(seurat_subset, 
              features = top_genes_heatmap, 
              group.by = "perturbation_group") +
      scale_fill_gradientn(colors = c("blue", "white", "red"))
  }
} else {
  message("没有发现显著差异表达基因")
}

# 保存结果
write.csv(deg_results, "Dnmt3a_vs_Safe_DEG_results.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# build metadata
meta_df <- data.frame(grna_group = grna_group)
rownames(meta_df) <- colnames(expr_mat)
seurat_obj <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = expr_mat, meta.data = meta_df)

# Subset keeps features
seurat_filtered <- subset(
  seurat_obj,
  subset = grna_group %in% c("Dnmt3a", "Safe"),
  features = rownames(seurat_obj)
)

Idents(seurat_filtered) <- "grna_group"

# Run DEG
deg <- FindMarkers(seurat_filtered, ident.1 = "Dnmt3a", ident.2 = "Safe")
head(deg)
```
